---
category: news
title: "Ensembled deep learning model outperforms human experts in diagnosing biliary atresia from sonographic gallbladder images"
excerpt: "It is still challenging to make accurate diagnosis of biliary atresia (BA) with sonographic gallbladder images particularly in rural areas without relevant expertise. Here, the authors develop a diagnostic deep learning model which favourable performance in comparison with human experts in multi-center external validation."
